item.title: Dev Information Technology Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs 22.57
item.description: Dev Information Technology Ltd’s stock price declined sharply to a new 52-week and all-time low of Rs.22.57 on 25 Feb 2026, marking a significant downturn amid continued underperformance relative to its sector and benchmark indices. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Uma Exports Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Uma Exports Ltd has reached a new 52-week low, with its share price touching an intraday low of ₹27.51, just 1.98% above its lowest level of ₹27.25 recorded over the past year. This marks a significant decline for the stock, which has been on a downward trajectory for the last nine consecutive trading sessions, losing 15.91% in returns during this period. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Abbott India Ltd. Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Underperformance
item.description: Abbott India Ltd. has recently touched a 52-week low, closing just 1.49% above its lowest price point of Rs 26,006.3. This marks a significant moment for the pharmaceutical and biotechnology company as it continues to face headwinds reflected in its stock performance and valuation metrics. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Integra Essentia Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Integra Essentia Ltd’s shares have declined to a fresh 52-week low, closing at ₹1.32 on 25 Feb 2026, marking a significant milestone in the stock’s ongoing downward trajectory. This new low reflects persistent headwinds faced by the FMCG company amid broader market dynamics and company-specific performance factors. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Geecee Ventures Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend

item.title: Country Club Hospitality & Holidays Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Weak Financial Metrics

item.title: Asahi Songwon Colors Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.210

item.title: Mid-Cap Segment Sees Mild Correction Amid Mixed Sectoral Trends
item.description: The mid-cap segment experienced a modest decline on 25 Feb 2026, with the BSE Midcap index slipping 0.42% on the day and registering a sharper 1.81% drop over the past five sessions. Despite this overall softness, select stocks and sectors demonstrated resilience, underscoring a nuanced market environment for mid-caps. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Large-Cap Segment Sees Modest Gains Led by Vedanta; Adani Power Lags
item.description: The large-cap segment demonstrated a cautiously optimistic performance on 25 Feb 2026, with the BSE 100 index edging up by 0.33% amid a backdrop of selective sectoral strength and stock-specific movements. Vedanta emerged as the standout performer, delivering a robust 4.64% return, while Adani Power struggled, declining 2.57%. The advance-decline ratio of 71 advancing stocks to 29 decliners underscored a broadly positive market breadth within the large-cap universe. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Small-Cap Segment Faces Pressure Amid Mixed Market Signals on 25 Feb 2026
item.description: The BSE Smallcap index has experienced a modest decline of 0.9% today, extending a recent five-day slide of 2.03%, signalling a cautious phase for the small-cap segment. Despite this, select stocks within the index have delivered notable returns, underscoring a mixed performance landscape marked by sectoral divergences and a narrow advance-decline ratio. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Mankind Pharma Ltd Hits Intraday High with 5.29% Surge on 25 Feb 2026
item.description: Mankind Pharma Ltd demonstrated robust intraday performance on 25 Feb 2026, surging to an intraday high of Rs 2,165.8, marking a 5.47% increase. The stock outpaced the broader Sensex, which recorded a modest 0.06% gain, reflecting significant buying momentum within the Pharmaceuticals & Biotechnology sector. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: SpiceJet Ltd Hits Day High with Strong Intraday Surge on 25 Feb 2026
item.description: SpiceJet Ltd witnessed a robust intraday rally on 25 Feb 2026, surging to its day high despite recent downward trends. The airline stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices, marking a notable reversal after six consecutive days of decline. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Micro and Small Cap Stocks Deliver Exceptional Half-Year Returns Amid Bullish Market Sentiment
item.description: Titan Biotech, a micro cap player in the Specialty Chemicals sector, has delivered an exceptional return of 173.57% over the past six months, outpacing its peers and the broader market benchmarks by a significant margin. This remarkable performance underscores the stock’s strong fundamentals, bullish technical outlook, and sector-specific catalysts that have driven investor enthusiasm. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Top-Performing Stocks Deliver Exceptional Returns Amid Market Volatility
item.description: Valiant Communications has delivered an exceptional return of 325.68% over the past year, outpacing key benchmark indices and peers across sectors. This remarkable performance, driven by robust fundamentals and bullish technical indicators, positions the micro-cap telecom equipment player as a standout in a challenging market environment. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Spectrum Electrical Industries Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure
item.description: Spectrum Electrical Industries Ltd experienced a notable intraday decline on 25 Feb 2026, with its stock price touching a low of Rs 1240.15, marking an 11.18% drop. This downturn reflects immediate selling pressure despite a broadly stable market environment, as the stock underperformed its sector and the benchmark Sensex. Time: 3 hours ago
